DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study determine injection rhuFab V2 eye combination verteporfin photodynamic therapy ( PDT ) safe efficacious treatment patient age-related macular degeneration .
DOC.brief_title: Intravitreal Injections rhuFab V2 Combination With Visudyne Subjects With Age Related Macular Degeneration ( AMD )
